item.description:
July 3rd, 2008: The Legal Landscape - One Year Later

It's been one year since the Attorney General in Massachusetts drastically changed the foreclosure laws, and that's not the end of it. One year later, what has changed? What new regulation is in the works impacting investors statewide? What have we learned? What do you need to know to stay on the right side of the law?

Find out at Turning the Key on July 3rd!

Register today and reserve your seat for the July 3rd Turning the Key! For more information or to register you can visit our website at ForeclosuresMass.com or call us at 617-275-4800.

Register early and get $10 off admission price plus a free BONUS!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: ForeclosuresMass' Turning the Key Networking/Education Event September Meetup
